title: American Symbols and Monuments

vocab.definition: Something that stands for or represents something else
A building or statue built to remember important people or events
Love and support for your country
Freedom to make your own choices
A government where people have a say in decisions
Traditions and culture passed down from the past

teachingNotes: Show pictures of national symbols. Discuss what they represent. Connect to Pledge of Allegiance and national anthem.
